"Hello. Looks like you made it back okay: "It's okay, I know what you want to say. You don't need to play dumb for me."
"It's just as you think. I am me. Or that is to say, I am the one asking you to chase that dragon."
"Singing while taking a break, I didn't expect for my cover to get blown like that."
"Failure as an idol? Or maybe I fail at keeping secrets."
"I guess it doesn't really matter. I'm probably not suited for either one."
"I know there are probably a lot of things you want to say, but I have something to ask of you."
"Please keep this a secret. That's all I ask!"
"I'll keep it a secret"
"Remain silent"
"What ever happens a promise is a promise. Don't break it, but somehow I feel a bit relieved."
"Even if I've been trying to sell myself as an idol, I've been doing my best to not leak any information."
"As such no information has been leaked as of yet."
"This is not a threat to you, just..."
"It really means a lot to me if you can keep this information quiet."
"I know with all that's happened it might be difficult to respond."
"But it's futile to try and spread this information, you'll just be eliminated."
"That's why it's best to stay quiet. You should be fine that way."
"Anyways, idols have lives as well."
"You should just consider yourself lucky that you got to see a behind the scenes look at what goes on."
"I won't be leaving or anything, so I'm counting on your from here on as well."
